K12D0561_H0518:52a-1: a'arya mah'a pra ti sa ra bidy'a r'i dzny'i /

K12D0561_H0518:53a-3: sangs rgyas kyi zhi'i du mar de bzhin gshegs pa

K12D0561_H0518:54a-27: bar snang la rgyu ba'i rgyu skar dang /
K12D0561_H0518:54a-28: gza' thams cad kyi lha rnams dang /
K12D0561_H0518:54a-30: phyogs mtshams kyi lha rnams dang /
K12D0561_H0518:54b-3: 'byung po rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams dang /

K12D0561_H0518:54b-11: rlung gi lha chen po bdun dang /
K12D0561_H0518:54b-12: dbang bdag chung ma dang bcas pa g-yog bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma can dang /
K12D0561_H0518:54b-13: sred med kyi bu g-yog dang bcas pa dang /
K12D0561_H0518:54b-18: tshogs kyi bdag po chen po dang /

K12D0561_H0518:54b-21: shing gseb kyi lha drug cu dang /
K12D0561_H0518:54b-22: sring mo bzhi ming po dang bcas pa dang /
K12D0561_H0518:54b-23: rdo rje'i lu gu rgyud dang /

K12D0561_H0518:54b-30: dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa'i lha dang /
K12D0561_H0518:55a-3: gnon po tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag dang /
K12D0561_H0518:55a-8: dus kyi lha thams cad dang /
K12D0561_H0518:55a-9: sa'i lha dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te /
K12D0561_H0518:55a-10: bcom ldan 'das de chos kyi 'khor lo ni shin tu bskor /
K12D0561_H0518:55a-11: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ni /
K12D0561_H0518:55a-12: shin tu yongs su mthar phyin /
K12D0561_H0518:55a-13: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs ni /
K12D0561_H0518:55a-15: thams cad mkhyen pa ni shin tu yongs su bzung /
K12D0561_H0518:55a-16: byang chub chen po'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa dang sa ni brnyes /
K12D0561_H0518:55a-17: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i sku ni rab tu 'bar /

K12D0561_H0518:55a-20: bdud kyi las thams cad la ni mkhas /
K12D0561_H0518:55a-21: sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa ni shes /
K12D0561_H0518:55a-22: spyan rnam pa lnga ni mnga'/
K12D0561_H0518:55a-23: rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ni ldan /
K12D0561_H0518:55a-24: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ni ldan /
K12D0561_H0518:55a-25: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang ni ldan /
K12D0561_H0518:55a-26: bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba'i tshogs thams cad ni bcom /
K12D0561_H0518:55b-2: khyu mchog dang seng+ge'i sgra ni sgrog /

K12D0561_H0518:55b-15: sku ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa
K12D0561_H0518:55b-16: gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan te

K12D0561_H0518:55b-25: rin po che du ma padma'i snying po la chags pa /
K12D0561_H0518:55b-26: rin po che ke ke ru dang /
K12D0561_H0518:55b-27: ke ke ru chen po dang /

K12D0561_H0518:55b-31: bar byas te kun nas mdzes pa; gdugs rtsa ba

K12D0561_H0518:55b-33: skye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas rnam par brgyan pa /
K12D0561_H0518:56a-1: du mas kun nas bskyabs pa /
K12D0561_H0518:56a-2: dpag bsam gyi shing du mas rgyas par mdzes par byas pa /
K12D0561_H0518:56a-3: rdo rje rin po che'i khri ri rab tsam la
K12D0561_H0518:56a-4: bzhugs te gser gyi ri bo'i rgyal po ltar dpal
K12D0561_H0518:56a-7: nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis rnam par brgyan /
K12D0561_H0518:56a-8: zla ba nya ba ltar 'jig rten thams cad la sdug par ni; snang /
K12D0561_H0518:56a-9: dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa chen po ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni /
K12D0561_H0518:56a-10: shin tu rgyas shing chos ston te /
K12D0561_H0518:56a-13: bar du dge ba; tha mar dge ba /
K12D0561_H0518:56a-19: yongs su byang ba yang dag par rab tu ston to //

K12D0561_H0518:56a-21: spu nas 'od zer gyi dra ba sangs rgyas thams
K12D0561_H0518:56a-22: cad kyi zhing kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba
K12D0561_H0518:56a-23: bkye ste / 'od zer gyi dra ba des stong
K12D0561_H0518:56a-24: gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di
K12D0561_H0518:56a-25: snang bas khyab par gyur to //
K12D0561_H0518:56a-26: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag na sangs rgyas bcom

K12D0561_H0518:56b-8: lto 'phye chen po thams cad dang thabs cig tu

K12D0561_H0518:56b-10: bye ma snyed dang mnyam pa de dag thams cad
K12D0561_H0518:56b-11: kyang snang ba des khyab par gyur to //
K12D0561_H0518:56b-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor phal po che
K12D0561_H0518:56b-13: la bka' stsal pa; sems can kun la snying brtse'i
K12D0561_H0518:56b-14: phyir // nyes par byas dang gnod pa kun //
K12D0561_H0518:56b-16: gzungs 'di rab tu bshad par bya //
K12D0561_H0518:56b-17: 'di ni thos pa tsam gyis kyang //
K12D0561_H0518:56b-18: sdig pa kun ni zad par 'gyur //
K12D0561_H0518:56b-19: sems can kun la bde ba sbyin //
K12D0561_H0518:56b-20: nad do cog las grol bar byed //
K12D0561_H0518:56b-21: sems can kun la snying brtse bas //

K12D0561_H0518:56b-24: 'jig rten dag gi mgon pos gsungs //
K12D0561_H0518:56b-25: 'di yis srung ba byas na ni //
K12D0561_H0518:56b-26: lha ma yin gyi gnas su 'jug /
K12D0561_H0518:56b-27: de bzhin lcang lo can dang ni //
K12D0561_H0518:56b-28: srin po'i gnas kyi sar yang 'gro //
K12D0561_H0518:56b-29: 'byung po klu dang sha za rnams //
K12D0561_H0518:56b-31: 'byung po'i tshogs rnams thams cad dang //
K12D0561_H0518:56b-32: dgra bo cog gis mi tshugs so //
K12D0561_H0518:56b-33: ming tsam bzung ste brjod byas kyang //
K12D0561_H0518:56b-34: skem byed brjed byed smyo byed dang //
K12D0561_H0518:56b-35: mkha' 'gro ma dang sha za dang //
K12D0561_H0518:57a-2: so sor 'brang ba'i gzi brjid kyis //
K12D0561_H0518:57a-3: gzi chen mdangs rnams za ba dang //
K12D0561_H0518:57a-4: mi yi skye rgu rnams 'tshe ba //
K12D0561_H0518:57a-5: de dag thams cad rengs byed 'gyur //
K12D0561_H0518:57a-6: byad stems mi bzad gang yin dang //
K12D0561_H0518:57a-7: pha rol dmag tshogs phung bar byed //
K12D0561_H0518:57a-8: sngags kyi las kyis gnod mi 'gyur //
K12D0561_H0518:57a-9: rtsa ba'i las las rnam par grol //
K12D0561_H0518:57a-10: dug dang dug sbyar mes mi tshugs //
K12D0561_H0518:57a-11: mtshon dang chus kyang tshugs mi 'gyur //
K12D0561_H0518:57a-12: lce 'bab glog gis mi tshugs te //
K12D0561_H0518:57a-13: dus kyi rlung gis gnod mi 'gyur //
K12D0561_H0518:57a-14: rig pa'i rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis //
K12D0561_H0518:57a-16: de yi don rnams thams cad 'grub //
K12D0561_H0518:57a-17: rtag tu rgyal ba thob par 'gyur //
K12D0561_H0518:57a-18: gang gis rtag tu mgul pa'am //
K12D0561_H0518:57a-19: lag par rig pa btags na ni //
K12D0561_H0518:57a-20: de yi dgos pa yod do cog /
K12D0561_H0518:57a-22: byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang //
K12D0561_H0518:57a-23: sangs rgyas rnams dang rang 'dren dang //
K12D0561_H0518:57a-24: de bzhin klu yi rgyal po dang //
K12D0561_H0518:57a-25: lha dbang rnams ni rtag tu srung //
K12D0561_H0518:57a-27: nyan thos sangs rgyas thams cad dang //
K12D0561_H0518:57a-28: rig pa'i lha mo rdzu 'phrul che //
K12D0561_H0518:57a-29: rtag tu srung ba byed par 'gyur //
K12D0561_H0518:57a-30: lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin dbang //
K12D0561_H0518:57a-31: de bzhin rgyal po bzhi rnams dang //
K12D0561_H0518:57b-0: de @57b la nyin dang mtshan rnams su //
K12D0561_H0518:57b-1: srung bar byed de the tshom med //
K12D0561_H0518:57b-2: brgya byin lha dang bcas pa dang //
K12D0561_H0518:57b-3: tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang chen dang //
K12D0561_H0518:57b-4: dga' ba'i dbang po nag po che //
K12D0561_H0518:57b-5: smin drug bu dang tshogs kyi dbang //
K12D0561_H0518:57b-6: ma mo'i tshogs rnams thams cad dang //
K12D0561_H0518:57b-7: de bzhin bdud ris gzhan rnams dang //
K12D0561_H0518:57b-8: drang srong gzi brjid che rnams dang //
K12D0561_H0518:57b-9: rdzu 'phrul chen po'i lha rnams dang //
K12D0561_H0518:57b-10: de kun so sor 'brang ba yi //
K12D0561_H0518:57b-11: gzungs 'dzin de la srung bar byed //
K12D0561_H0518:57b-12: sangs rgyas bdag nyid che rnams dang //
K12D0561_H0518:57b-13: rig pa'i lha mo stobs chen dang //
K12D0561_H0518:57b-14: bdag gi ma dang khro gnyer dang //
K12D0561_H0518:57b-15: lha mo sgrol ma lcags kyu dang //
K12D0561_H0518:57b-16: rdo rje lu gu rgyud dang dkar //
K12D0561_H0518:57b-17: de bzhin dkar mo chen mo dang //
K12D0561_H0518:57b-18: nag mo che dang pho nya dang //
K12D0561_H0518:57b-19: de bzhin rdo rje pho nya dang /
K12D0561_H0518:57b-20: zhags pa bzang dang rdo rje zhags //
